name: Mygni
tag_list: online, search, schedule, scheduling, appointments, appointment, local, businesses, business, local-business, local-businesses, 247, free, visits, tax, salons, spas, health, chiropractors, accountants, massage, innovation, novel, creative
overview:
Mygni is a free 24/7 online service that lets people find and schedule appointments with the local businesses using multiple search options in few simple steps.

At Mygni you can find Tax Professionals, Spas, Chiropractors, Dentists, Doctors and many more Businesses. Read reviews and recommendation from real customers (those who visited the business).

Mygni operates in the services industry with a mission to bridge the gap between the local businesses and customers by using various web and social networking based tools.
